properties.NAME: LB Hillingdon - Homeless Prevention Team
properties.DESCRIPTIO: Assessment of entitlement to housing for people who are homeless or threatened with homelessness. Provision of housing for people considered in priority need of housing. Temporary accommodation may be available while enquiries are made about eligibility. Also offer general housing advice and information for private and council tenants and homeless people. Emergencies phone 01895 250111. This service helps: People who are or may be priority homeless, and the general public.

properties.NAME: Trinity Homeless Projects - Hillingdon
properties.ADDRESS: LB Hillingdon Housing Options, Housing Needs Reception, Civic Centre, UB* 9SA
properties.DESCRIPTIO: This service helps: Single homeless men aged 17-55 with support needs. Can accept ex-offenders and substance misusers. Must have a local connection to Hillingdon.

properties.NAME: Trinity Homeless Projects - Norwood Gardens
properties.ADDRESS: LB Hillingdon Hosuing Options, Hosuing Needs Reception, Civic Centre, UB8 9SA
properties.DESCRIPTIO: This service helps: Single homeless men aged 17-55 with support needs. Can accept ex-offenders and substance misusers. Must have a local connection to Hillingdon.

properties.NAME: P3 - Chilton House
properties.DESCRIPTIO: This service helps: Young single homeless people aged 18-25 with low to medium support needs. Priority given to those with a local connection to LB Hillingdon.

properties.NAME: YMCA St. Pauls Group - Uxbridge
properties.DESCRIPTIO: This service helps: Young people leaving care, young people at risk aged 16-25 with low, medium or high support needs. Must have a local connection.

properties.NAME: P3 - Swakefields
properties.DESCRIPTIO: This service helps: Young single homeless people aged 16-18 with additional support needs. Must have a local connection to LB Hillingdon. This hostel only accepts referrals from Hillingdon Social Services.
